articles.author: JOSH FUNK AP Business Writer
articles.title: CSX 4Q profit declines 9% as railroad hauls less freight
articles.description: CSX said its profit declined 9% in the fourth quarter as the railroad hauled 7% less freight
articles.content:
OMAHA, Neb. -- 
CSX said its profit declined 9% in the fourth quarter as the railroad hauled 7% less freight.
